dbPr.command: SET NOCOUNT ON_x000a_SELECT prop.prop_id INTO #myProps FROM csd.prop prop WHERE _x000a_(prop.prop_id = '1234567' OR prop.lead_prop_id = '1234567')_x000a_SELECT DISTINCT prop.prop_id, pa.prop_atr_code, id=identity(18), 0 as 'seq' INTO #myPRCs_x000a_FROM #myProps prop, csd.prop_atr pa WHERE pa.prop_id = prop.prop_id AND pa.prop_atr_type_code = 'PRC'_x000a_ORDER BY prop.prop_id, pa.prop_atr_code_x000a_SELECT prop_id, MIN(id) as 'start' INTO #myStarts FROM #myPRCs GROUP BY prop_id_x000a_UPDATE #myPRCs set seq = id-M.start FROM #myPRCs r, #myStarts M WHERE r.prop_id = M.prop_id_x000a_SELECT prop.prop_id, prop.cntx_stmt_id, prop.bas_rsch_pct, prop_stts.prop_stts_abbr, prop.pm_ibm_logn_id, pi_vw.pi_last_name, pi_vw.pi_frst_name, inst.inst_name,_x000a_prop.org_code, CASE WHEN prop.org_code<>prop.orig_org_code THEN prop.orig_org_code END AS orig_org,_x000a_prop.pgm_ele_code, CASE WHEN prop.pgm_ele_code <> prop.orig_pgm_ele_code THEN prop.orig_pgm_ele_code END AS orig_PEC, _x000a_(SELECT MAX( CASE pa.seq WHEN 0 THEN pa.prop_atr_code ELSE '' END ) + ' ' +_x000a_ MAX( CASE pa.seq WHEN 1 THEN pa.prop_atr_code ELSE '' END ) + ' ' +_x000a_ MAX( CASE pa.seq WHEN 2 THEN pa.prop_atr_code ELSE '' END ) + ' ' +_x000a_ MAX( CASE pa.seq WHEN 3 THEN pa.prop_atr_code ELSE '' END ) + ' ' +_x000a_ MAX( CASE pa.seq WHEN 4 THEN pa.prop_atr_code ELSE '' END ) + ' ' +_x000a_ MAX( CASE pa.seq WHEN 5 THEN pa.prop_atr_code ELSE '' END ) + ' ' +_x000a_ MAX( CASE pa.seq WHEN 6 THEN pa.prop_atr_code ELSE '' END ) FROM #myPRCs pa WHERE p.prop_id = pa.prop_id) AS PRCs_x000a_FROM #myProps p, csd.inst inst, csd.pi_vw pi_vw, csd.prop prop, csd.prop_stts prop_stts_x000a_WHERE prop.pi_id = pi_vw.pi_id AND prop.inst_id = inst.inst_id AND p.prop_id = prop.prop_id AND prop.prop_stts_code = prop_stts.prop_stts_code_x000a_DROP TABLE #myStarts DROP TABLE #myPRCs DROP TABLE #myProps_x000a_
